thread.section_title: Hotel Beacon - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Simply Amazing!!
thread.title_full: Simply Amazing!! - Review of Hotel Beacon, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Glen R
title: Simply Amazing!!
text:
I have had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Beacon several times around and I would never stay anywhere else. It's not because of its fantastic location or the room sizes but the staff that make it all happen, they are amazing and bend over backwards to ensure your stay is truly memorable. Thank you Tom Travers and Eliana you two are the best.
I'm looking at returning again later this year hope you'll have us back guys.
